attributes.action: Ensure there are prosecutions for the members of the Social Services involved with "Baby P"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned ask the Government to take step to bring to justice all those responsible for the torture and death of baby P. An apology is not enough.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
